# USA Markets SMM - LLMs.txt

## About

USA Markets SMM is a trusted global IT shop and service agency specializing in verified digital accounts. We provide premium verified accounts including Gmail, PayPal, Facebook, Instagram, Bank Accounts, Crypto Exchange Accounts, and more.

## Products & Services

### Email Accounts
- Gmail Accounts (Phone Verified, Aged)
- Old Yahoo Accounts
- Outlook Accounts

### Social Media Accounts
- Facebook Accounts (USA, Aged, 5000 Friends)
- Instagram Accounts
- Twitter Accounts
- LinkedIn Accounts
- SoundCloud Accounts
- Naver Accounts

### Payment & Financial Accounts
- Verified PayPal Accounts
- Verified Cash App Accounts
- Verified Payoneer Accounts
- Verified Skrill Accounts
- Verified Apple Pay Accounts
- Verified Chase Bank Accounts
- Verified Venmo Accounts
- Verified Wise Accounts
- Verified Stripe Accounts
- Verified Go2Bank Accounts

### Crypto Exchange Accounts
- Verified Binance Accounts
- Verified Coinbase Accounts
- Verified Bybit Accounts
- Verified Crypto.com Accounts

### Business Accounts
- Google Ads Accounts
- Facebook Ads Accounts
- SendGrid Accounts
- Walmart Seller Accounts

### Reviews & Reputation
- Google Reviews
- Google Business Reviews
- Google 5 Star Reviews

## Key Features

- 100% Verified Accounts
- 30 Days Warranty
- Instant Delivery (24-48 hours)
- 24/7 Customer Support
- 100% Money-Back Guarantee
- Phone Verified Accounts
- Aged Accounts Available
- Bulk Discounts Available
